Hi,
has anybody of you experience with the administration of TestRuns within
TestDirector?
I want to save some log or report messages in the TestDirector database and
it should work like the tl_step or report_msg functions within the
TestDirector?

Has anybody of you implemented something like this already?

Thanks in advance
subject: JUnit with TestDirector
